name: 2PlayerSpaceShooter
description:
I recommend you get two keyboards for U and a friend.

Play by yourself... or play with a friend... either way you will have 2 spaceships that must work together to kill enemy ships and earn points...  The longer you wait to go in for the kill... the more enemies will appear... good luck!!!

CONTROLS:

Player1:  A (left) D (right) F (shoot)

(This one is too obvious)

Player2:  LEFT ARROW (left) RIGHT ARROW (right) SPACE (shoot)

Press P to restart.

PS.... music is extremely annoying
